meanings.definition: A gradual reduction or decrease in size, amount, or intensity.
meanings.sent1: The phasedowns of the company's workforce were implemented over several months.
meanings.sent2: The phasedowns of the sugar intake helped improve his health over time.
meanings.sent3: The phasedowns of the dessert portions left everyone craving more sweets!
meanings.sent4: Her phasedowns in spending were like watching a balloon slowly deflate.
meanings.sent5: The phasedowns of the music volume made the concert more intimate.

meanings.definition: The act of scaling back or diminishing gradually.
meanings.sent1: The phasedowns in production were necessary to align with market demand.
meanings.sent2: His phasedowns in social activities allowed him to focus on his studies.
meanings.sent3: The phasedowns in screen time led to more family board game nights.
meanings.sent4: The phasedowns in city traffic felt like a weight lifted off commuters' shoulders.
meanings.sent5: Her phasedowns in caffeine intake made her feel more energized in the mornings.
